name: Lunala Prism Star
author: Hitoshi Ariga
flavor_text: Said to live in another world, this Pokémon devours light, drawing the moonless dark veil of night over the brightness of day.

attacks.name: Full Moon Star
attacks.effect: For each of your opponent’s Pokémon in play, attach a {P} Energy card from your discard pile to your Pokémon in any way you like.

attacks.name: Psystorm
attacks.effect: This attack does 20 damage times the amount of Energy attached to all Pokémon.

rule_box: You can’t have more than 1 Prism Star card with the same name in your deck. If a Prism Star card would go to the discard pile, put it in the Lost Zone instead.
